verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> an <S%G652>apostle,<s%> (not of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> by <S%G444>man,<s%> but by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1453>raised<s%> him from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%>)
And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> which are with me, to the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G1053>Galatia:<s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be to you and <S%G1515>peace<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and from our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> for our <S%G266>sins,<s%> that he might <S%G1807>deliver<s%> us from <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1764>present<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and our <S%G3962>Father:<s%>
To <S%G3739>whom<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

I <S%G2296>marvel<s%> that you are <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5030>soon<s%> <S%G3346>removed<s%> from him that <S%G2564>called<s%> you <S%G1722>into<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2098>gospel:<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> is not <S%G243>another;<s%> but there be <S%G5100>some<s%> that <S%G5015>trouble<s%> you, and <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3344>pervert<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

But <S%G1437>though<s%> we, <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2097>preach<s%> any other <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to you <S%G3844>than<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G2097>preached<s%> to you, let him be <S%G331>accursed.<s%>

As we <S%G4280>said<s%> <S%G4280>before,<s%> <S%G2532>so<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> I <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G2097>preach<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> other <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to you <S%G3844>than<s%> that you have <S%G3880>received,<s%> let him be <S%G331>accursed.<s%>

For do I <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G3982>persuade<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2316>God?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> do I <S%G2212>seek<s%> to <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G444>men?<s%> for <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G700>pleased<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> I should not be the <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
But I <S%G1107>certify<s%> you, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> that the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G2097>preached<s%> of me is not <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G444>man.<s%>
For I <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3880>received<s%> it of <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> was I <S%G1321>taught<s%> it, but by the <S%G602>revelation<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For you have <S%G191>heard<s%> of my <S%G391>conversation<s%> in <S%G4218>time<s%> past in the <S%G2454>Jews'<s%> <S%G2454>religion,<s%> how that <S%G2596>beyond<s%> <S%G5236><s%> <S%G5236>measure<s%> I <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and <S%G4199>wasted<s%> it:

And <S%G4298>profited<s%> in the <S%G2454>Jews'<s%> <S%G2454>religion<s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> my <S%G4915>equals<s%> in <S%G3450>my<s%> own <S%G1085>nation,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G4056>more<s%> <S%G4056>exceedingly<s%> <S%G2207>zealous<s%> of the <S%G3862>traditions<s%> of my <S%G3967>fathers.<s%>

But <S%G3753>when<s%> it <S%G2106>pleased<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G873>separated<s%> me from my <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G2836>womb,<s%> and <S%G2564>called<s%> me by his <S%G5485>grace,<s%>

To <S%G601>reveal<s%> his <S%G5207>Son<s%> in me, that I might <S%G2097>preach<s%> him <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>heathen;<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> I <S%G4323>conferred<s%> not with <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G129>blood:<s%>

<S%G3761>Neither<s%> <S%G424>went<s%> I up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> to them which were <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> me; but I <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G688>Arabia,<s%> and <S%G5290>returned<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G1154>Damascus.<s%>

<S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> I <S%G424>went<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%G2477>see<s%> <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> and <S%G1961>stayed<s%> with him <S%G1178>fifteen<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>
But <S%G2087>other<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> I <S%G3756>none,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord's<s%> <S%G80>brother.<s%>
<S%G2236>Now<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G1125>write<s%> to you, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> I <S%G5574>lie<s%> not.
<S%G1899>Afterwards<s%> I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2824>regions<s%> of <S%G4947>Syria<s%> and <S%G2791>Cilicia;<s%>
And was <S%G50>unknown<s%> by <S%G4383>face<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were in <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

But they had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> That he which <S%G1377>persecuted<s%> us in <S%G4218>times<s%> past <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2097>preaches<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G4218>once<s%> he <S%G4199>destroyed.<s%>
And they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> in me.
